title: Render Unto Caesar
description:
Nate, Julian, and Luke riff on the theme of Render Unto Caesar.  They talk about what vision of reality shines forth when one pushes past the obvious Sunday school answer of 'Christians should pay taxes' and dig into the deeper levels of meaning and what this means for how Christians should interact with the political realm.  For fun, stick around to see them point out the radical difference between 19th century Marxist-leftist utopian Anarchism and Christian Anarchism.

Julian's Blogpost: https://coffeewithkierkgaard.home.blog/2021/05/21/parables-of-the-kingdom/
